General.Name: Bibica Corp
General.Description: Bibica Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, produces and trades in confectionery products in Vietnam. It offers biscuits and cookies; pie and sponge cakes; hard, soft, and jelly candies; nutrition products; bread products; chocolates; gluco syrups; wafers; crackers; cashews; and mid-autumn products, as well as agricultural products and spices. The company was formerly known as Bien Hoa Confectionery Corporation and changed its name to Bibica Corporation in January 2007. Bibica Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
